title: Best of The Herd for Mar 05, 2020
itunes:title: Best of The Herd for Mar 05, 2020
description:
The Chargers trade with the Panthers was all about making their sales pitch to Tom Brady

Luka is a star, Zion is an icon

The 49ers are questioning Jimmy Garoppolo's judgement

Tom Brady needs to lower his expectations of Bill Belichick

Giannis will never be the next LeBron 


Guest: Greg Cosell, NFL Films 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
